department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply of clean replacement towels and soiled towel pickup and laundry service to 86 Airfield Systems and Utilities Flight (86 ASU) located at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton, in Quinte West, ON.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 17 May 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. 86 Airfield Systems and Utilities Flight (86 ASU) is a Canadian Forces unit located on CFB Trenton, in Quinte West, ON. It is a heavily mechanical Construction Engineering unit, specializing in aircraft arresting systems, water & fuel systems, and large generator enclosures. The nature of the work done at 86 ASU leads to the creation of waste in the form of shop towels contaminated with various industrial substances. This creates the need for clean replacement towels to be supplied, and soiled towels to be picked up and cleaned in accordance with standard industry practices for these types of soiled items.
full_summary:
================================

**W0125-23WR02: Shop Towel Exchange Service**

**Reference Number: WS3974526228-Doc3987334092**

**Publication Date:** April 28, 2023
**Tender Closure Date:** May 17, 2023, 14:00 EDT

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Notice Type - Demande de propositions in French)

**Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

**Background**

The Department of National Defence (DND) at the Canadian Forces Base Trenton requires a Shop Towel Exchange Service to provide clean replacement towels and pick up soiled towels contaminated with industrial substances. The services will be provided to the 86 Airfield Systems and Utilities Flight.

**Bid Requirements**

Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by May 17, 2023, at 14:00 EDT, to be considered. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Attachments**

None.

**Notice URL**

Please visit http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16134188?extsite=MTYxMzQxODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== for more information.

**Contact Information**

Contact: Terri Stork, Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)

Email: [terri.stork@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:terri.stork@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: ( Not Available )
Fax: ( Not Available )

Note:
- Each bid submission must include the following information:

    - Contact name
    - Company name
    - Address
    - Phone number
    - E-mail address
    - Fax number
======

Please ensure to include all necessary information and attachments as specified above. This is an international tender.
